title: Update unit testing

labels.name: maintenance
labels.description: Continuous integration, unit testing & package distribution

body:
## Overview of basic unit test framework for sktime

### References issues
#246, #25 

### All estimators
Tests common to all estimator objects in sktime, adapted list from scikit-learn's [estimator_checks](https://github.com/scikit-learn/scikit-learn/blob/95d4f0841d57e8b5f6b2a570312e9d832e69debc/sklearn/utils/estimator_checks.py):

- [x] check has base API attributes
- [x] check inherits from BaseEstimator and one of the task-specific estimators
- [x] check ("predict", "transform", "decision_function", "predict_proba", "inverse_transform") does not change fitted parameters
- [x] check fit does not overwrite hyper-parameters (also add checks for other methods like predict, transform etc)
- [x] check not fitted error for ("predict", "transform", "decision_function", "predict_proba", "inverse_transform")
- [x] check fit updates state ("is_fitted", "_is_fitted")
- [x] check fit returns self
- [x] check fit idempotent 
- [x] check set_params returns self
- [x] check repr
- [x] check clone
- [x] test no logic/interaction in constructor
- [x] check get-params invariance (use sklearn function: check_get_params_invariance)
- [x] check set params (use sklearn function: check_set_params)
- [x] check persistence via pickle
- [ ] check pipeline invariance
- [ ] different data types in input data container (empty, nan, inf)
- [ ] check corner cases for fit/predict/transform (1 sample, 1 timepoint, 1 column)

### Series-as-features predictors (regressors/classifiers/clustering algorithms)
- [x] check inputs
- [x] check multivariate estimators, create tags `_tags = ("multivariate")` as class variable
- [ ] check fit full vs fit by batch invariance
- [ ] check fit and score always accept y as second input argument
- [ ] check input target (missing, single lable, zero variance)
- [x] check predict output
- [ ] check score method

### Series-as-features transformers
- [x] input data and transformed data has the same index 
- [x] check multivariate estimators

### Forecasters
- [x] check inputs
- [x] check input target warnings (zero variance)
- [x] check predict output
- [x] test score
- [x] test predict in-sample
- [x] test predict out-of-sample
- [x] test update predict
- [x] test fh
- [x] test oh 

### Ignored scikit-learn tests
* sample weight tests
* class weight tests
